sentences.en: As Wanyne enters, he finds four impassive faces regarding him coolly.
sentences.cn: 韦恩走进来, 看见四张毫无表情的脸冷冰冰地看着他.

sentences.en: Hagen's face suddenly became smoothly impassive. Then he said, " OK, I'll keep this purely business. "
sentences.cn: 黑根立刻板起面孔, 装出一本正经的样子,然后说: “ 好, 我就单纯就事论事吧. ”

sentences.en: He searched Hill's impassive face for some indication that he understood.
sentences.cn: 他盯着希尔毫无表情的面孔，寻找着表明他已明白的些许迹象。

sentences.en: He shook his head again, looking at their hard impassive faces.
sentences.cn: 他于是又摇了摇头, 望着他们铁青冰冷的脸.

sentences.en: He was rigid, erect, and impassive.
sentences.cn: 他一动不动, 笔直地站着, 脸上毫无表情.

sentences.en: Her face is impassive as she listens to Miller dictating the warrant for her arrest.
sentences.cn: 她毫无表情地在听米勒口述拘留她的证书.

sentences.en: Her face remained impassive, studying the Belgian as he completed the form.
sentences.cn: 她不动声色, 仔细观察正在填写表格的那个比利时人.

sentences.en: Her impassive face showed no reaction at all.
His face remained impassive, so strong was his self - control .
sentences.cn: 他依然是面无表情, 自控 能力是如此之强.

sentences.en: His servant was quite impassive and waited for his orders.
sentences.cn: 仆人无动于衷,等候他的吩咐.

sentences.en: Javert was impassive, his grave face betrayed no emotion whatever.
sentences.cn: 沙威是铁面无情的, 他严厉的面容,绝不露一点慌张的颜色.

sentences.en: Michael's face was impassive when he said to his brother, " You straightened out , Freddie? "
sentences.cn: 迈克尔的脸上毫无表情.他对自己的哥哥说: “弗烈特, 你给教训过了, 对 吗 ?”

sentences.en: Of us all, Roger put on the most impassive front.
sentences.cn: 在我们所有人中间, 罗杰最装得若无其事.

sentences.en: The defendant remained impassive as the judge sentenced him to death.
sentences.cn: 当法官宣布被告死刑时他始终毫无表情.

sentences.en: The impassive earth seemed to have swallowed her up without an effort , without a tremor.
sentences.cn: 似乎那无情的大地毫不费力地把她吞没了.

sentences.en: Val glanced sideways at his mother's impassive face; it had a hunted look in the eyes.
sentences.cn: 法尔斜看一下母亲神色不动的脸色, 眼睛里有一种无可奈何的神情.

words.tran_cn: 无感情地；缺乏热情；冷淡，冷漠

trans.tran_cn: 冷漠的，无感情的，无意识的
